Elegy for a Revolutionary bụ obere ihe nkiri 2013 nke Paul van Zyl duziri ma dee ya.  Ihe nkiri a bụ Brian Ames, Martin Copping, na Michael Enright, ma dabere na akụkọ eziokwu nke otu ndị ọcha na South Africa na-agbalị ime mkpesa banyere ịkpa ókè agbụrụ.
Ọrụ Copping dị ka Jeremy James nwetara ihe nrite onye ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2013 Filmstock Film Festival.
Film Threat nyere nyocha dị mma maka ihe nkiri ahụ, na-ekwu na "naanị mkpesa ha banyere Elegy for a Revolutionary bụ na ọ dị mkpirikpi ma ọ bụghị ihe ngosi".
